title: CH29006: Fluid Flow Laboratory And Design
text: The class will be divided into three sections in 2:1:1 ratio. Half the class will attend the design class. The rest half is further divided into the two slots for Fluid Flow Laboratory. The courses get swapped for both the halves of the class after midsem.
page: CH29006: Fluid Flow Laboratory And Design

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite- CH20001Laboratory experiments: Bernoulli s experiment, Flow through square and circular pipes, Flow through horizontal nozzles, Flow through pipe fittings, Flow through packed beds, V-notch, Pitot tube, Venturi and Orifice meters, Rotameter, Pipe flow viscometer, Pump characteristics.Design- Studies on valves, pipe fittings and piping network design.
page: CH29006: Fluid Flow Laboratory And Design

title: Classroom resources
text: Introduction to Chemical Equipment Design: Mechanical Aspects by B. C. Bhattacharyya is a must book for both attending the classes and for studying. There's no point in going to the class without the book.
